titles: The exercise of prayer: or, A help to devotion Being a supplement to the happy ascetick, or best exercise. Containing prayers and devotions, suitable to the respective exercises with additional prayers for several occasions. By Anth. Horneck D.D.
author: Horneck, Anthony, 1641-1697.
publisher: printed for Mark Pardoe at the Black Raven, over against Bedford-house in the Strand,
notes: As the title says, intended as a supplement to his Happy ascetick.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
keywords: Devotional literature, English --  Early works to 1800.
